title: Provision games,. won 7 out of 10 games, all solo que, all positive kda BRONZE IV!!!!!
body:
Guys, i wont 7 out of 10 provision games, and ranked to BRONZE IV. How does that work does anyone know? I was silver 5 last season. And the last 3 game i won, i was actually losing MMR points? How does it work?
Cheers BOYS

replies.body:
>I was silver 5 last season.

You were literally the closest you could be to bronze without actually being in it, and now that your skill has been re-evaluated, you're angry that you were placed into bronze?

Your MMR is what scales with what division you get put in, and because your MMR was at 871 once you finished your provs, that's what made you go down to Bronze IV. 

Ether season 4 you got to silver and just stopped playing ranked and your mmr might of slowly dropped at some point.
